video.title: Sword Art Online II
video.synopsis: A video game whiz creates a new technology that enables players to guide their online avatars with their own bodies -- but a dark twist emerges.

episodes.synopsis: When a new game called Gun Gale Online proves lethal in real life, the government asks Kazuto to join the game and investigate the incidents.
episodes.title: The World of Guns

episodes.synopsis: Inside the Gun Gale Online gaming world, a squadron led by an elite sniper named Sinon takes on an unexpectedly robust foe.
episodes.title: Cold-Hearted Sniper

episodes.synopsis: Sinon's controller, Shino, recalls a traumatic gun-related incident from her past. Meanwhile, Kirito tells Asuna of his plans to join Gun Gale Online.
episodes.title: Memories of Fresh Blood

episodes.synopsis: Now inside Gun Gale Online, Kirito plans to smoke out Death Gun by joining Bullet of Bullets, a tournament to determine the game's best gunman.
episodes.title: GGO

episodes.synopsis: While facing the possibility of having to fight Sinon in the Bullet of Bullets contest, Kirito discovers a clue regarding the identity of Death Gun.
episodes.title: Guns and Swords

episodes.synopsis: After surmising the identity of Death Gun, Kirito fights Sinon but stubbornly refuses to beat her despite his superior skills.
episodes.title: Showdown in the Wilderness

episodes.synopsis: Suguha confronts Kazuto about his activities in the online world as he grapples with having killed people in the Sword Art Online incident.
episodes.title: Crimson Memories

episodes.synopsis: Believing that Death Gun will reveal himself during the Bullet of Bullets, Kirito and Sinon set an ambush while the melee rages around them.
episodes.title: Bullet of Bullets

episodes.synopsis: After Death Gun eludes them during the Bullet of Bullets, Kirito and Sinon pursue him to the Lost City, but soon find themselves in the crosshairs.
episodes.title: Death Gun

episodes.synopsis: After Kirito saves Sinon from Death Gun's bullet at the last moment, the two flee on mechanical horses and take refuge in a cave to regroup.
episodes.title: Death Chaser

episodes.synopsis: Having escaped Death Gun's trap, Kirito and Sinon theorize how he can kill people in real life while slaying their avatars within Gun Gale Online.
episodes.title: What It Means to Be Strong

episodes.synopsis: As the Bullet of Bullets tournament reaches its climax, Kirito and Sinon target Death Gun, but another contestant throws a wrench into the works.
episodes.title: Bullet of a Phantom

episodes.synopsis: Working together inside the game, Kirito and Sinon manage to slay Death Gun, but the villain's menace soon follows them into the real world.
episodes.title: Phantom Bullet

episodes.synopsis: After thwarting an attempt on Shino's life, Kazuto helps her come to terms with the traumatic shooting incident from her past.
episodes.title: One Small Step

episodes.synopsis: Shino takes a look back at the story so far, including the Bullet of Bullets tournament and the foiling of Death Gun, both inside the game and out.
episodes.title: Debriefing

episodes.synopsis: When the legendary sword Excalibur is rumored to be in an icy dungeon in Alfheim Online, Kirito, Sinon and their friends set out to find it first.
episodes.title: Queen of the Lake

episodes.synopsis: Kirito and company take on a giant in their quest to recover Excalibur -- and learn that failing their task will trigger an in-game apocalypse.
episodes.title: King of the Giants

episodes.synopsis: The god Thor unexpectedly joins the battle against the powerful ice giant guarding Excalibur, but Kirito's quest has a final surprising twist.
episodes.title: Excalibur

episodes.synopsis: After an update to the Alfheim Online world, a mysterious high-level player begins defeating all challengers. Is she a survivor of Sword Art Online?
episodes.title: House in the Forest

episodes.synopsis: After sparring with her mother over her future in the real world, Asuna takes on Yuuki, the mysterious challenger, who makes a surprising request.
episodes.title: Zekken

episodes.synopsis: After sparring with her mother over her future in the real world, Asuna takes on Yuuki, the mysterious challenger, who makes a surprising request.
episodes.title: Sleeping Knights

episodes.synopsis: While Kirito battles the rival guild, Asuna and the Sleeping Knights take on the floor boss. Meanwhile, Yuuki lets a surprising revelation slip.
episodes.title: The Monument of the Swordsmen

episodes.synopsis: Back in the real world, Kazuto helps Asuna locate Yuuki, who reveals her tragic story and asks Asuna to meet with her again in Alfheim Online.
episodes.title: The End of the Journey

episodes.synopsis: After helping Yuuki realize her dream of attending school, Asuna begins to repair her fractured relationship with her mother.
episodes.title: The Dream Begins

episodes.synopsis: As Yuuki's real-world condition worsens, she says her final goodbyes -- and Asuna discovers a surprising connection to the Sword Art Online incident.
episodes.title: Mother's Rosario
